info.title: Datum API
info.description: Programmatic interfaces for interacting with Datum Services

get.description: List EmailVerificationTokens.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new EmailVerificationToken and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the EmailVerificationToken with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: EmailVerificationToken with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the EmailVerificationToken with the requested ID.

204.description: EmailVerificationToken with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a EmailVerificationToken and persists changes to storage.

get.description: Find the attached User of the EmailVerificationToken with the given ID

200.description: User attached to EmailVerificationToken with requested ID was found
